activity: Fly Fishing on the Madison River
five_reasons: Scenic canyon and meandering meadow stretches
Accessible spots just minutes from town
Multiple fly shops and guided services available
Peak season aligns with beautiful weather
local_tips: Early morning and late evening are best for dry fly action. Stop at Big Sky Anglers for local hatch updates.

activity: Hiking to Fairy Falls and Imperial Geyser
five_reasons: Beautiful waterfall and backcountry geyser combo
One of the less crowded thermal features
local_tips: Start early to avoid crowds and bring bear spray. Parking can fill up fast near Midway Geyser Basin.

five_reasons: Flat, scenic trail along the Madison River
Wildlife often spotted in early morning
local_tips: Check out Freeheel and Wheel for rentals and trail maps.

activity: Horseback Riding at Diamond P Ranch
five_reasons: Great for families and first-time riders
Three ride types based on comfort level
local_tips: Book early during peak summer. Long pants and boots recommended.

activity: Boating or Kayaking on Hebgen Lake
five_reasons: Multiple boat ramps and rental outlets
local_tips: Wind picks up in the afternoon, so start early. Kirkwood Marina has kayak rentals.

activity: Scenic Drive into Yellowstone via Firehole Canyon Drive
local_tips: Drive early in the morning for best lighting and photo conditions.

five_reasons: One of Yellowstone’s best wildlife viewing areas
Great for bison, elk, and sometimes wolves
Morning and dusk are most active times
local_tips: Bring spotting scopes or binoculars. Avoid mid-day crowds.

five_reasons: Great for teens and thrill seekers
local_tips: Waivers required. Arrive 15 minutes early to gear up.

activity: Swimming at Firehole River Swim Area
five_reasons: Safe, calm current section open in summer
Fun break on a long day
local_tips: Bring water shoes for rocks and check if area is open (it closes during high flow).

activity: Day Trip to Quake Lake Visitor Center
five_reasons: Great views of the scarred landscape
local_tips: Combine with Hebgen Lake for a full day of water + history.
